column4: : can you help me, how can i switch back my normal desktop login, now i ve terminal login
: ive update some software yesterday, and today when i open my pc, its directly goes to teminal log in session
sudo service gdm start   does what?
when you press ctrl-alt-f7, you see gdm?
: its show something like "checking battery, setting sensor and etc, then the result all OK
when you pressed ctrl-alt-f7?  How about ctrl-alt-f8 or ctrl-alt-f9?
: yes, ctrl-alt-f8 nothing happen ctrl-alt-f9 also nothing happen (just show me black screen)
check /var/log/Xorg.0.log, try stopping gdm, and starting it again (I must go, eyes are refusing to stay open)
: just quote /var/log/Xorg.0.log not include the "check" right?
it's just a text file that you should read to look for hints
you must use a text editor to read it
: text editor? i cant go anywhere at my pc, its just black screen and nothing can do except try to type something to solve
good luck, I'm going to bed now
